definition: to welcome/to meet/to face/to forge ahead (esp. in the face of difficulties)
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: It blooms much earlier than other flowers.
sentences.chinese: 迎春花比其他花開得早。

sentences.english: Only the falling winter jasmine knew the truth.
sentences.chinese: 只有那雕零的迎春花知道。

sentences.english: But whenever this point, the heart of winter jasmine another smile, it makes me grow.
sentences.chinese: 但每當此時，心裏的迎春花又一次微笑，它使我成長。

sentences.english: When an 85-million-dollar open, the breeze gently up, I still can and you meet again.
sentences.chinese: 當迎春花開，微風輕起的時候，我還能與你再相見。

sentences.english: How many petals does nudiflorum Lindl. have?
Why do people call nudiflorum Lindl. as spring angel?
sentences.chinese: 人們爲什麼把迎春花稱作報春使者？

sentences.english: The quality and optimum extraction technology of winter jasmine 's yellow pigment were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了迎春花黃色素的最佳提取工藝及性質。

sentences.english: Suddenly, I saw a winter jasmine, which bloom on my smiling face.
sentences.chinese: 剎那間，我看到了一株迎春花，它在對我綻放笑臉。

sentences.english: Extraction and stability research on the pigment of winter jasmine;
sentences.chinese: 研究了迎春花黃色素的最佳提取工藝及性質。

definition: fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers
style of folk song popular in Gansu, Qinghai and Ningxia/CL:首[shou3]
variant of 臘梅|腊梅[la4 mei2]
